sent.orig: The liquid candle having colour flame and fragrance comprises candle core and candle body.
sent.trans: 香味液体彩焰蜡烛是采用无公害液体燃料为主燃剂，由烛芯和烛体构成。

sent.orig: After the candle wick was burned up, the candle could not be used any more.
sent.trans: 烛芯烧完，蜡烛也就不能用了。

sent.orig: Pork placed the candle on the candle stand and came to her side.
sent.trans: 波克把蜡烛放到烛台上，便来到她身边。

sent.orig: We lit the candle and the candle lit the room.
sent.trans: 我们点燃了蜡烛，蜡烛照亮了房间。

sent.orig: A candle is a primitive dark sucker. lA new candle has a white wick.
sent.trans: 一支新的蜡烛有一根白色的芯。
